settings.name: VIDEONORMALLEVEL
settings.description: Sets the display brightness level in % when this power plan is activated

settings.name: f1fbfde2-a960-4165-9f88-50667911ce96
settings.description: Sets the display brightness level in % when the display gets dimmed

settings.name: VIDEODIM
settings.description: Display is dimmed after the given timeout in seconds

settings.name: VIDEOIDLE
settings.description: Turn off display after the given timeout in seconds

settings.name: VIDEOCONLOCK
settings.description: Turn off display after the given timeout in seconds when system is locked

settings.name: STANDBYIDLE
settings.description: Enter sleep after the given timeout in seconds

settings.name: UNATTENDSLEEP
settings.description: Timeout in seconds before system enters sleep after waking up unattended

settings.name: HIBERNATEIDLE
settings.description: Enter hibernate after the given timeout in seconds post sleep

settings.name: RTCWAKE
settings.description: Specify if timed events are allowed to wake system from sleep

settings.name: PROCTHROTTLEMIN
settings.description: Minimum performance state of the system in %

settings.name: ESBRIGHTNESS
settings.description: Specifies the value in % to scale brightness to when Energy Saver is turned on

settings.name: ASPM
settings.description: Specifies the power plan for PCI Express link

settings.name: DEVICEIDLE
settings.description: Specify whether conservation or performance idle timeouts are used

settings.name: CONSOLELOCK
settings.description: Specifies whether to enter a password when the system resumes from sleep

settings.name: CONNECTIVITYINSTANDBY
settings.description: Specifies whether to allow networking during standby

settings.name: DISCONNECTEDSTANDBYMODE
settings.description: Specify standby mode when disconnected from network
